name: Airline Director 2 - Tycoon Game
description: Airline Director 2 is a management game set in the challenging field of commercial aviation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Core i3 or better Graphics: HD3000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Seeing all the negative reviews, I was hesitant to try this, but I must say: it is not bad at all!  I do not think it is finished though, but since the idea and engine are actually pretty great, only a few minor fixes are needed to make it really enjoyable: - the tutorial is already better, but a few bubbles telling what the different numbers mean, might be of great help (it can be figured out but it takes quite a little trial and error) - Some stats would be really nice: a table listing all routes with the same info I can get when I'm clicking on it, (which I can order by the different columns) would help a lot to find what to focus on. - Might be nice to set the quality aspects separately for the different routes / or at least to be able to start sub-brands with different setups (as in real life: many big airlines also own low-cost alternatives) - and yes, some goals might be great, or at least some correspondence between how much money we make and how much legroom we get in adjustments (i.e. points I can spend in each turn) Anyhow: for the developer: don't give up, just finish the game For other players: don't give up on difficulty to figure it out, it is quite enjoyable once you know what you are doing

Not really an airline mangement. All you do is choose air routes and then try to match a right size plane to it. It looks fun but for an afternoon or at most a couple of days. But not a lasting game. So considering the price, it is ok.
